title: Bloomberg Markets: Store Capital CEO on Berkshire's 9.8% Stake
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Store Capital CEO on Berkshire's 9.8% Stake
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Christopher Volk CEO Store Capital Discussing Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. taking a 9.8 percent stake in real estate investment trust Store Capital Corp.
